author: Brenda Goh
title: 'No farewells, no ceremonies': China's Hubei cremates coronavirus dead
description: Ten unclaimed urns sit in the crematorium in Jingzhou, a city in central China's Hubei province hard-hit by coronavirus.
content:
JINGZHOU, China (Reuters) - Ten unclaimed urns sit in the crematorium in Jingzhou, a city in central China’s Hubei province hard-hit by coronavirus. 
Not only are funerals banned across China, in places like Jingzhou bereaved relatives who are stuck in their… [+4263 chars]
